description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pumpkin, Chilli & Ginger Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Pumpkin, Chilli & Ginger Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg pumpkin, peeled and cut into chunks
4 cloves garlic, crushed whole with the back of a knife
1 tbs fresh root ginger, grated or finely chopped
1 medium fresh mediumhot long red chilli, deseeded and thinly sliced
4 sprigs fresh flatleaf parsley, leaves only

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Put the pumpkin on a baking tray, and toss with the olive oil, garlic, and ginger. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for about 30 minutes until tender and golden. Set aside.

Transfer the cooled pumpkin to a blender or food processor, and add the chilli, parsley (reserving a little to garnish), and lemon zest and juice. Blend to a chunky purée. Season with salt and black pepper.

Put the pumpkin purée and the yoghurt in a bowl, and mix thoroughly. Season if needed, then spoon into a serving bowl. Top with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil (if using). Garnish with the reserved parsley and a sprinkle of paprika, and serve on grilled sourdough bread, with grilled pancetta or prosciutto over the top.
